appSubtitle: Quickly shape slide styles and themes to craft clear, structured slide prompts
usageGuideStep1: Choose the slide style you want, or add new settings as you wish
usageGuideStep2: When you want to generate slides in NotebookLM, copy and paste the prompt into "Describe the slide deck you want to create" under "Customize Slide Deck".
usageGuideStep3: Or download the prompt (prompt.txt) and upload it as NotebookLM reference material.
usageGuideWireframeTitle: Wireframe placeholders (replace with your images later)
contentPlaceholder: Paste topic notes, context, and key points...
resultReadyHint: Preview is ready. Copy or export the generated prompt
resultEmptyHint: Enter source content to generate a live prompt preview.
emptyPrompt: No prompt yet. Fill in controls and content to generate output.
customOptionTranslationHint: Tip: Custom options are not translated automatically.

style-default-1.name: Photorealistic
style-default-1.promptHint: Use lifelike lighting, physically plausible materials, realistic textures, and natural depth with minimal stylization

style-default-2.name: Cinematic Lighting
style-default-2.promptHint: Use directional key lighting, deep shadow contrast, atmospheric haze, and dramatic framing for film-like visual tension

style-default-3.name: Minimalist
style-default-3.promptHint: Prioritize whitespace, strict element reduction, clean alignment, and restrained accents to keep hierarchy crisp and uncluttered

style-default-4.name: Flat Design
style-default-4.promptHint: Use crisp 2D geometry, solid fills, clear icon forms, and high legibility without heavy gradients or texture noise

style-default-5.name: Isometric
style-default-5.promptHint: Construct visuals in consistent isometric perspective with modular blocks, clear depth cues, and orderly spatial structure

style-default-6.name: 3D Render / C4D Style
style-default-6.promptHint: Use polished 3D forms, smooth reflections, soft global illumination, and depth-rich composition with a modern tech finish

style-default-7.name: Memphis Design
style-default-7.promptHint: Use bold geometric motifs, asymmetrical rhythm, playful pattern layering, and high-contrast accents with controlled balance

style-default-8.name: Cyberpunk
style-default-8.promptHint: Use high-contrast neon accents, dark atmospheric layers, reflective surfaces, and dense futuristic visual detail

style-default-9.name: Line Art
style-default-9.promptHint: Use precise line hierarchy, simplified contours, limited fills, and consistent stroke logic for clean structural clarity

style-default-10.name: Synthwave
style-default-10.promptHint: Use retro-futuristic gradients, geometric grids, analog glow, and horizon-driven depth with nostalgic digital aesthetics

style-default-11.name: Pixel Art
style-default-11.promptHint: Use intentional pixel geometry, low-resolution edge treatment, limited palette blocks, and grid-locked composition

style-default-12.name: Risograph
style-default-12.promptHint: Use offset color layers, halftone grain, print misregistration texture, and limited-ink contrast for analog print character

style-default-13.name: Bauhaus
style-default-13.promptHint: Use primary geometric primitives, disciplined proportion, strong typographic hierarchy, and function-first visual balance

style-default-14.name: Low Poly
style-default-14.promptHint: Use faceted polygon planes, angular shading transitions, simplified volume, and clean triangulated structure

style-default-15.name: Watercolor
style-default-15.promptHint: Use soft pigment diffusion, transparent layering, irregular edges, and gentle tonal blending with organic flow

style-default-16.name: Oil Painting
style-default-16.promptHint: Use rich brushstroke texture, layered pigment depth, subtle impasto feel, and classical light-volume modeling

style-default-17.name: Ukiyo-e
style-default-17.promptHint: Use flat color planes, stylized contour lines, decorative pattern rhythm, and woodblock-inspired compositional balance

style-default-18.name: Pop Art
style-default-18.promptHint: Use saturated contrast, bold outlines, graphic repetition, and comic halftone energy with punchy visual impact

style-default-19.name: Paper Cutout
style-default-19.promptHint: Use stacked paper-like layers, soft cast shadows, cut-edge silhouettes, and tactile depth through layered planes

style-default-20.name: Charcoal Sketch
style-default-20.promptHint: Use expressive charcoal strokes, tonal smudging, rough edge definition, and draft-like conceptual composition
